GfxCountryMapGenerator Class Reference

Objects of this class extracts an geographic "map" for one country and sends it via socket to the module/server. More...

Detailed Description

Objects of this class extracts an geographic "map" for one country and sends it via socket to the module/server.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool GfxCountryMapGenerator::includeItem (  const Item *  item,
GenericMap *  theMap,
bool &  reduceGfxToPoint,
uint16  polygon = MAX_UINT16
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Abstract method.

Determine if to include a item on given zoomlevel.

The caller make sure that in case a StreetItem is sent to this method, all polygons of that StreetItem must be checked seperately (with the polygon parameter set). This is the case since different polygons of a StreetItem can have different roadclasses.

Parameters:
item The item to check.
theMap The map containing the item.
reduceGfxToPoint Outparameter, set to true if the graphics should be reduced to a single point.
polygon Only need to be supplied when passing a StreetItem as item. Which polygon of the StreetItem to check if it is to be included.
Returns:
True if item should be included, false otherwise.

Implements GenericGfxMapGenerator.
